item.title: AMGEN INC 10-K
item.description: AMGEN INC, which is in the Biological Products (No Diagnostic Substances) [2836] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 09, 2023 had 56384 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 483 instances product - 424 instances products - 418 instances december - 399 instances may - 376 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
